<s>  when they saw that they might not come a-nigh him, they ran either on other and so slew themselves between them, nor would they stint their fighting together for the damsel. </s>
<s>  perceval beheld the miracle of these folks that were thus killed, and the damsel that made right great dole thereof. </s>
<s>  "ha, damsel," saith he, "weep not, but repent you of this false belief, for they that are unwilling to believe in god shall die like mad folks and devils!" perceval made the squires that were there within bear the bodies out of the hall, and made them be cast into a running water, and straightway slew all the other, for that they were not minded to believe. </s>
<s>  the castle was all emptied of the misbelieving folk save only the damsel and those that waited upon her, and the christian thrall that guarded the gate. </s>
<s>  perceval set him forth of the chain, then led him up into the hall and made him disarm him. </s>
<s>  he found sundry right rich robes. </s>
<s>  the damsel, that was of right great beauty, looked at him and saw that he was a full comely knight, and well pleased she was with him. </s>
<s>  she honoured him in right great sort, but she might not forget the three knights that were her brothers, and made sore dole for them. </s>
<s>  xxi. </s>
<s>  "damsel," saith perceval, "nought availeth it to make this dole, but take comfort on some other manner. </s>
<s> " perceval looked at the hall from one end to the other and saw that it was right rich, and the damsel, in whom was full great beauty, stinted of making dole to look at perceval. </s>
<s>  she seeth that he is comely knight and gentle and tall and well furnished of good conditions, wherefore he pleaseth her much, and forthwith beginneth she to love him, and saith to herself that, so he would leave his god for the god in whom she believed, right glad would she be thereof, and would make him lord of her castle, for it seemed her that better might she not bestow it, and sith that her brothers are dead, there may be no bringing of them back, and therefore better would it be to forget her dole. </s>
<s>  but little knew she perceval's thought, for had she known that which he thinketh, she would have imagined not this. </s>
<s>  for, and had she been christian he might not have been drawn to love her in such sort as she thinketh, sith that josephus telleth us that never did he lose his virginity for woman, but rather died virgin and chaste and clean of his body. </s>
<s>  in this mind was she still, nor never might she refrain her heart from him. </s>
<s>  thinketh she rather that, and he knew she was minded to love him, right joyous would he be thereof, for that she is of so passing beauty. </s>
<s>  perceval asketh the damsel what she hath in her thought? " sir," saith she, "nought think i but only good and you will. </s>
<s> " "damsel," saith perceval, "never, please god, shall there be hindrance of me but that you renounce this evil law and believe in the good. </s>
<s> " "sir," saith she, "do you renounce yours for love of me, and i will do your commandment and your will. </s>
<s> " xxii. </s>
<s>  "damsel," saith perceval, "nought availeth to tell me this. </s>
<s>  were you man like as you are woman, your end would have come with the others. </s>
<s>   please god, your tribulation shall tend itself to good. </s>
<s> " "sir," saith she, "so you are willing to promise me that you will love me like as knight ought to love damsel, i am well inclined to believe in your god. </s>
<s> " "damsel, i promise you as i am a christian that so you are willing to receive baptism, i will love you as he that firmly believeth in god ought to love damsel. </s>
<s> " "sir," saith she, "i ask no more of you. </s>
<s> " she biddeth send for a holy man, a hermit that was in the forest appurtenant, and right gladly came he when he heard the tidings. </s>
<s>  they held her up and baptized her, both her and her damsels with her. </s>
<s>  perceval held her at the font. </s>
<s>  josephus witnesseth us in this history that she had for name celestre. </s>
<s>  and great joy made she of her baptism, and her affections turned she unto good. </s>
<s>  the hermit remained there with her, and taught her to understand the firm believe, and did the service of our lord. </s>
<s>  the damsel was of right good life and right holy, and ended thereafter in many good works. </s>
<s>  xxiii. </s>
<s>  perceval departed from the castle, and gave thanks to our lord and praise, that he hath allowed him to conquer a castle so cruel and to attorn it to the law. </s>
<s>  he went his way a great pace, all armed, until he came into a country wherein was great grief being made, and the more part said that he was come that should destroy their law, for that already had he won their strongest castle. </s>
<s>  he is come towards an ancient castle that was at the head of a forest. </s>
<s>  he looketh and seeth at the entrance of the gateway a full great throng of folk. </s>
<s>  he seeth a squire come forth thence, and asketh him unto whom belongeth the castle. </s>
<s>  "sir," saith he, "it is queen jandree's, that hath made her be brought before her gate with the folk you see yonder, for she hath heard tell how the knights of the raving castle are dead, and another knight that hath conquered the castle hath made the damsel be baptized, wherefore much she marvelleth how this may be. </s>
<s>  she is in much dread of losing her l for her brother madeglant of oriande is dead, so that she may no longer look to none for succour, and she hath been told how the knight that conquered the raving castle is the best knight of the world, and that none may endure against him. </s>
<s>  for this doubtance and fear of him she is minded to go to one of her own castles that is somewhat stronger. </s>
<s> " perceval departeth from the squire and rideth until they that were at the entrance of the gateway espied him. </s>
<s>  they saw the red cross that he bare on his shield, and said to the queen, "lady, a christian knight is coming into this castle. </s>
<s> " "take heed," saith she, "that it be not he that is about to overthrow our law!" perceval cometh thither and alighteth, and cometh before the queen all armed. </s>
<s>  the queen asketh what he seeketh. </s>
<s>  xxiv. </s>
<s>  "lady," saith he, "nought seek i save good only to yourself so you hinder it not. </s>
<s> " "you come," saith she, "from the raving castle, there where three brothers are slain, whereof is great loss. </s>
<s> " "lady," saith he, "at that castle was i, and now fain would i that your own were at the will of jesus christ, in like manner as is that. </s>
<s> " "by my head," saith she, "and your lord hath so great power as is said, so will it be. </s>
<s> " "lady, his virtue and his puissance are far greater than they say. </s>
<s> " "that would i fain know," saith she, "presently, and i am fain to pray you that you depart not from me until that it hath been proven. </s>
<s> " perceval granteth it gladly. </s>
<s>  she returned into her castle and perceval with her. </s>
<s>  when he was alighted he went up into the hall. </s>
<s>  they that were within marvelled them much that she should thus give consent, for never, sithence that she had been blind, might she allow no knight of the new law to be so nigh her, and made slay all them that came into her power, nor might she never see clear so long as she had one of them before her. </s>
<s>  now is her disposition altered in such sort as that she would fain she might see clear him that hath come in, for she hath been told that he is the comeliest knight of the world and well seemeth to be as good as they witness of him. </s>
<s>  xxv. </s>
<s>  perceval remained there gladly for that he saw the lady's cruelty was somewhat slackened, and it seemed him that it would be great joy and she were willing to turn to god, and they that are within there, for well he knoweth that so she should hold to the new law, all they of the land would be of the same mind. </s>
<s>  when perceval had lain the night at the castle, the lady on the morrow sent for all the more powerful of her l and came forth of her chamber into the hall where perceval was, seeing as clear as ever she had seen aforetime. </s>
<s>  "lords," saith she, "hearken ye all, for now will i tell you the truth like as it hath befallen me. </s>
<s>  i was lying in my bed last night, and well know ye that i saw not a whit, and made my orisons to our gods that they would restore me my sight. </s>
<s>  it seemed me they made answer that they had no power so to do, but that i should make be slain the knight that was arrived here, and that and i did not, sore wroth would they be with me. </s>
<s>  and when i had heard their voices say that nought might they avail me as for that i had prayed of them, i remembered me of the lord in whom they that hold the new law believe. </s>
<s>  and i prayed him right sweetly that, and so it were that he had such virtue and such puissance as many said, he would make me see clear, so as that i might believe in him. </s>
<s>  at that hour i fell on sleep, and meseemed that i saw one of the fairest ladies in the world, and she was delivered of a child therewithin, and he had about him a great brightness of light like it were the sun shone at right noonday. </s>
<s> " xxvi. </s>
<s>  "when the child was born, so passing fair was he and so passing gentle and of so sweet semblant that the looks of him pleased me well. </s>
<s>  and meseemed that at his deliverance there was a company of folk the fairest that were seen ever, and they were like as it had been birds and made full great joy. </s>
<s>  and methought that an ancient man that was with her, told me that my lady had lost no whit of her maidenhood for the child. </s>
<s>  well pleased was i the while this thing lasted me. </s>
<s>  it seemed me that i saw it like as i do you. </s>
<s>  thereafter, methought i saw a man bound to a stake, in whom was great sweetness and humility, and an evil folk beat him with scourges and rods right cruelly, so that the blood ran down thereof. </s>
<s>  they would have no mercy on him. </s>
<s>  of this might i not hold myself but that i wept for pity of him. </s>
<s>  therewithal i awoke and marvelled much whence it should come and what it might be. </s>
<s>  but in anyway it pleased me much that i had seen it. </s>
<s>  it seemed me after this, that i saw the same man that had been bound to the stake set upon a cross, and nailed thereon right grievously and smitten in the side with a spear, whereof had i such great pity that needs must i weep of the sore pain that i saw him suffer. </s>
<s>  i saw the lady at the feet of the cross, and knew her again that i had seen delivered of the child, but none might set in writing the great dole that she made. </s>
<s>  on the other side of the cross was a man that seemed not joyful, but he recomforted the lady the fairest he might. </s>
<s>  and another folk were there that collected his blood in a most holy vessel that one of them held for it. </s>
<s> " xxvii. </s>
<s>  "afterward, methought i saw him taken down of hanging on the cross, and set in a sepulchre of stone. </s>
<s>  thereof had i great pity for, so long as meseemed i saw him thus never might i withhold me from weeping. </s>
<s>  and so soon as the pity came into my heart, and the tears into my eyes, i had my sight even as you see. </s>
<s>  in such a lord as this ought one to believe, for he suffered death when he might lightly have avoided it had he so willed, but he did it to save his people. </s>
<s>  in this lord i will that ye all believe, and so renounce our false gods, for they be devils and therefore may not aid us nor avail us. </s>
<s>  and he that will not believe, him will i make be slain or die a shameful death. </s>
<s> " the lady made her be held up and baptized, and all them that would not do the same she made be destroyed and banished. </s>
<s>  this history telleth us that her name was salubre. </s>
<s>  she was good lady and well believed in god, and so holy life led she thereafter that in a hermitage she died. </s>
<s>  perceval departed from the castle right joyous in his heart of the lady and her people that believed in the new law. </s>
<s>  branch xxxiii. </s>
<s>  title i. </s>
<s>  afterward, this title telleth us that meliot of logres was departed from castle perilous sound and whole, by virtue of the sword that lancelot had brought him, and of the cloth that he took in the chapel perilous. </s>
<s>  but sore sorrowful was he of the tidings he had heard that messire gawain was in prison and he knew not where, but he had been borne on hand that two knights that were kinsmen of them of the raving castle that had slain one another, had shut him in prison on account of perceval that had won the castle. </s>
<s>  now, saith meliot of logres, never shall he have ease again until he knoweth where messire gawain is. </s>
<s>  he rideth amidst a forest, and prayeth god grant him betimes to hear witting of messire gawain. </s>
<s>  the forest was strange and gloomy. </s>
<s>  he rode until nightfall but might not find neither hold nor hermitage. </s>
<s>  he looketh right amidst the forest before him and seeth a damsel sitting that bemoaneth herself full sore. </s>
<s>  the moon was dark and the place right foul of seeming and the forest gloomy of shadow. </s>
<s>  "ha, damsel, and what do you here at this hour?" "sir," saith she, "i may not amend it, the more is my sorrow. </s>
<s>  for the place is more perilous than you think. </s>
<s>  look," saith she, "up above, and you will see the occasion wherefore i am here. </s>
<s> " meliot looketh and seeth two knights all armed hanging up above the damsel's head. </s>
<s>  thereof much marvelleth he. </s>
<s>  "ha, damsel," saith he, "who slew these knights so foully?" "sir," saith she, "the knight of the galley that singeth in the sea. </s>
<s> " "and wherefore hath he hanged them in such wise?" "for this," saith she, "that they believed in god and his sweet mother. </s>
<s>  and so behoveth me to watch them here for forty days, that none take them down of hanging, for and they were taken hence he would lose his castle, he saith, and would cut off my head. </s>
<s> " "by my head," saith meliot, "such watch is foul shame to damsel, and no longer shall you remain here. </s>
<s> " "ha, sir," saith the damsel, "then shall i be a dead woman, for he is of so great cruelty that none scarce might protect me against him. </s>
<s> " ii. </s>
<s>  "damsel," saith meliot, "foul shame would it be and i left here these knights in such wise for the reproach of other knights. </s>
<s> " meliot made them graves with his sword, and so buried them the best he might. </s>
<s>  "sir," saith the damsel, "and you take not thought to protect me, the knight will slay me. </s>
<s>  to-morrow, when he findeth not the knights, he will search all the forest to look for me. </s>
<s> " meliot and the damsel together go their way through the forest until they come to a chapel where was wont to be a hermit that the knight of the galley had destroyed. </s>
<s>  he helpeth down the damsel of his horse, and afterward they entered into the chapel, where was a great brightness of light, and a damsel was there that kept watch over a dead knight. </s>
<s>  meliot marvelleth him much. </s>
<s>  "damsel," said meliot, "when was this knight killed?" "sir, yesterday the knight of the galley slew him on the sea- shore, wherefore behoveth me thus keep watch, and in the morning will he come hither or ever he go to the castle where messire gawain hath to-morrow to fight with a lion, all unarmed, and my lady, that is mistress both of me and of this damsel you have brought hither, will likewise be brought to-morrow to the place where the lion is to slay messire gawain, and she in like sort will be afterward delivered to the lion and she renounce not the new law wherein the knight that came from raving castle, whereof she is lady, hath made her believe. </s>
<s>  and we ourselves shall be in like manner devoured along with her. </s>
<s>  but this damsel would still have taken respite of my death and she had still kept guard over the knights that were so foully hanged above her. </s>
<s>  natheless, sith that you have taken them down from where they were hanging, you have done a right good deed, whatsoever betide, for the lord of the red tower will give his castle to the knight for this. </s>
<s> " meliot is right joyous of the tidings that he hath heard of messire gawain that he is still on live, for well knoweth he, sith that the knight of the galley will come by the chapel there, that he will come thither or ever messire gawain doth battle with the lion. </s>
<s>  "sir," saith the damsel of the chapel, "for god's sake, take this damsel to a place of safety, for the knight will be so wood mad of wrath and despite so soon as he cometh hither, that he will be fain to smite off her head forthwith, and of yourself also have i great fear. </s>
<s> " iii. </s>
<s>  "damsel," saith meliot, "the knight is but a man like as am i. </s>
<s> " "yea, sir, but stronger is he and more cruel than seem you to be. </s>
<s> " meliot was in the chapel the night until the morrow, and heard the knight coming like a tempest, and he brought with him the lady of the castle and reviled her from time to time, and meliot seeth him come, and a dwarf that followeth after him a great pace. </s>
<s>  he crieth out to him: "sir, behold there the disloyal knight through whom you have lost your castle. </s>
<s>  now haste! avenge yourself of him! after that will we go to the death of messire gawain?" meliot, so soon as he espieth him, mounteth and maketh his arms ready. </s>
<s>  "is it you," saith the knight of the galley, "that hath trespassed on my demesne and taken down my knights?" "by my head, yours were they not! rather were they the knights of god, and foul outrage have you done herein when you slew them so shamefully. </s>
<s> " he goeth toward the knight without more words, and smiteth him so passing strong amidst the breast that he pierceth the habergeon and thrusteth all the iron of his spear into his body and afterward draweth it back to him with a great wrench. </s>
<s>  and the knight smiteth him so hard on his shield that he maketh an ell's length pass beyond, for right wroth was he that he was wounded. </s>
<s>  the dwarf crieth to him, "away, then! the knight endureth against you that have slain so many of them!" the knight of the galley waxeth wood wrath. </s>
<s>  he taketh his career, and cometh as fast as his horse may carry him, and smiteth meliot so strongly that he breaketh his spear in such sort that he maketh both him and his horse stagger. </s>
<s>  but meliot catcheth him better, for he thrusteth the spear right through his body and hurleth against him at the by-passing with such stoutness and force that he maketh him fall dead to the ground from his horse. </s>
<s>  the dwarf thought to escape, but meliot smote off his head, whereof the damsels gave him great thanks, for many a mischief had he wrought them. </s>
<s>  iv. </s>
<s>  meliot buried the knight that he found in the chapel dead, then told the damsels that he might abide no longer, but would go succour messire gawain and he might. </s>
<s>  the damsels were horsed to their will, for one had the horse of the knight that was slain and the other the horse of the dwarf. </s>
<s>  the other damsel was come upon a mule, and they said that they would go back, for the country was made all safe by the death of the knight. </s>
<s>  they thanked meliot much, for they say truly that he hath rescued them from death. </s>
<s>  meliot departeth from the damsels and goeth right amidst the forest as he that would most fain hear tidings of messire gawain. </s>
<s>  when he had ridden of a long space, he met a knight that was coming all armed at great pace. </s>
<s>  "sir knight," saith he to meliot, "can you tell me tidings of the knight of the galley?" "what have you to do therein?" saith meliot. </s>
<s>  "sir, the lord of the red tower hath made bring messire gawain into a launde of this forest, and there, all unarmed, must he do battle with a lion. </s>
<s>  so my lord is waiting for the knight of the galley, that is to bring two damsels thither that the lion will devour when he shall have slain messire gawain. </s>
<s> " "will the battle be presently?" saith meliot. </s>
<s>  "yea, sir," saith the knight, "soon enough betimes, for messire gawain hath already been led thither and there bound to a stake until such time as the lion shall be come. </s>
<s>  then will he be unbound, but even then two knights all armed will keep watch on him. </s>
<s>  but tell me tidings of the knight of the galley, and you have seen him?" "go forward," saith he, "and you will hear tidings of him. </s>
<s> " meliot departeth thereupon, a great gallop, and cometh nigh the launde whereunto messire gawain had been brought. </s>
<s>  he espied the two knights that kept guard over him, and if that messire gawain were in fear, little marvel was it, for he thought that his end had come. </s>
<s>  meliot espied him bound to an iron staple with cords about the body on all sides so that he might not move. </s>
<s>  meliot hath great pity thereof in his heart, and saith to himself that he will die there sooner than messire gawain shall die. </s>
<s>  he clappeth spurs to his horse when he cometh nigh the knights, and overtaketh one of them with such a rush that he thrusteth his spear right through his body, and beareth him down dead. </s>
<s>  the other was fain to go to the castle for succour when he saw his fellow dead. </s>
<s>  meliot slew him forthwith. </s>
<s>  he cometh to messire gawain, and so unbindeth him and cutteth the cords wherewith he is bound. </s>
<s>  "sir," saith he, "i am meliot of logres, your knight. </s>
<s> " v. </s>
<s>  when messire gawain felt himself unbound, no need to ask whether he had joy thereof. </s>
<s>  the tidings were come to the red court that queen jandree was christened and baptized, and that the knight was come that had such force and puissance in him that none might endure against him for the god in whom he believed, and they knew likewise that the knight of the galley was dead, and messire gawain unbound and the knights that guarded him slain. </s>
<s>  they say that there may they not abide, so they depart from the castle and say that they will cross the sea to protect their bodies, for that there they may have no safety. </s>
<s>  vi. </s>
<s>  when meliot had delivered messire gawain he made him be armed with the arms, such as they were, of one of the knights he had slain. </s>
<s>  messire gawain mounted on a horse such as pleased him, and right great joy had he at heart. </s>
<s>  they marvel much how it is that they of the castle have not come after them, but they know not their thought nor how they are scared. </s>
<s>  "meliot," saith messire gawain, "you have delivered me from death this time and one other, nor never had i acquaintance with any knight that hath done so much for me in so short a time as have you. </s>
<s> " they departed the speediest they might and rode nigh enow to the castle, but they heard none moving within nor any noise, nor saw they none issue forth, and much marvelled they that none should come after them. </s>
<s>  they rode until they came to the head of the forest and caught sight of the sea that was nigh enough before them, and saw that there was a great clashing of arms at the brink of the sea. </s>
<s>  a single knight was doing battle with all them that would fain have entered into a ship, and held stour so stiffly against them that he toppled the more part into the sea. </s>
<s>  they went thither as fast as they might, and when they drew nigh to the ship they knew that it was perceval by his arms and his shield. </s>
<s>  or ever they reached it, the ship was put off into the midst of the sea, wherein he was launched of his own great hardiment, and they went on fighting against him within the ship. </s>
<s>  "meliot," saith messire gawain, "see you, there is perceval the good knight, and now may we say of a truth that he is in sore peril of death. </s>
<s>  for that ship, save god bethink him thereof, shall arrive in such manner and in such a place as that never more shall we have no witting of him,  so he perish for ever, no knight on live may have power to set forward the law of our lord. </s>
<s> " vii. </s>
<s>  messire gawain seeth the ship going further away, and perceval that defendeth himself therein against them that set upon him. </s>
<s>  right heavy is he that he came not sooner, or ever the ship had put off from the land. </s>
<s>  he turneth back, he and meliot together, and right sorrowful was messire gawain of perceval, for they knew not in what land he might arrive,  might he have followed, right gladly would he have gone after him to aid him. </s>
<s>  they have ridden until they meet a knight. </s>
<s>  messire gawain asketh him whence he cometh, and he saith from king arthur's court. </s>
<s>  "what tidings can you tell us thereof?" saith messire gawain. </s>
<s>  "sir, bad enough!" saith he. </s>
<s>  "king arthur hath neglected all his knights for briant of the isles, and hath put one of his best knights in prison. </s>
<s> " "what is his name?" saith messire gawain. </s>
<s>  "sir, he is called lancelot of the lake. </s>
<s>  he had reconquered all the islands that had been reft of king arthur, and slain king madeglant, and conquered the land of oriande that he turned to the belief of the saviour of the world,  so soon as he had conquered his enemies, king arthur sent for him forthwith and straightway put him in his prison by the counsel of briant of the isles. </s>
<s>  but king arthur will have a surfeit of friends betimes. </s>
<s>  for king claudas hath assembled his folk in great plenty to reconquer the kingdom of oriande and come back upon king arthur by the counsel of briant of the isles that betrayeth the king, for he hath made him his seneschal and commander of all his land. </s>
<s> " "sir knight," saith messire gawain, "needs must the king miscarry that setteth aside the counsel of his good knights for the leasings of a traitor. </s>
<s> " thereupon the knight departed from messire gawain. </s>
<s>  right heavy is he of this that he hath said, that the king hath put lancelot in prison. </s>
<s>  never tofore did he aught whereby he wrought so much to blame. </s>
<s>  branch xxxiv. </s>
<s>  title i. </s>
<s>  hereupon the story is silent of messire gawain and meliot and speaketh of king claudas that hath assembled a great folk by the counsel of briant of the isles to come into the land of king arthur, for he knoweth that it is disgarnished of the good knights that wont there to be, and he knoweth all the secret plottings of the court and what power king arthur hath withal. </s>
<s>  he draweth toward his land the nighest he may, and hath won back the kingdom of oriande all at his will. </s>
<s>  but they of albanie still hold against him and challenge the land the best they may. </s>
<s>  tidings thereof come to the court of king arthur, and they of the country sent him word that so he send them not succour betimes they will yield up the land to king claudas, and oftentimes they long after lancelot, and say that so they had a defender like him, the islands would be all at peace. </s>
<s>  the king sent briant of the isles thither many times, that ever incontinent returned thence discomfit, but never sent he thither him that should have power to protect the land against king claudas. </s>
<s>  king arthur was sore troubled, for no witting had he of messire gawain nor messire ywain nor of others whereby his court had use of right to be feared and dreaded and of high renown throughout all other kingdoms. </s>
<s>  the king was one day in the hall at cardoil, right heavy. </s>
<s>  and he was at one of the windows, and remembered him of the queen and of his good knights that he wont to see oftener at court, whereof the more part were dead, and of the adventures that wont to befall therein whereof they saw none no longer. </s>
<s>  lucan the butler seeth him right heavy and draweth nigh unto him quietly. </s>
<s>  ii. </s>
<s>  "sir," saith he, "meseemeth you are without joy. </s>
<s> " "lucan," said the king, "joy hath been somewhat far from me sithence that the queen hath been dead, and gawain and the other knights have held aloof from my court so that they deign come hither no longer. </s>
<s>  moreover, king claudas warreth upon me and conquereth my lands so that no power have i to rescue me for default of my knights. </s>
<s> " "sir," saith lucan, "herein is there nought whereof you have right to accuse any save yourself alone. </s>
<s>  for you have done evil unto him that hath served you, and good unto them that are traitors to you. </s>
<s>  you have one of the best knights in the world and the most loyal in your prison, wherefore all the other hold them aloof from your court. </s>
<s>  lancelot had served you well by his good will and by his good knighthood, nor never had he done you any disservice whereof you might in justice have done him such shame. </s>
<s>  nor never will your enemies withhold them from you nor have dread of you save only through him and other your good knights. </s>
<s>  and know of a truth that lancelot and messire gawain are the best of your court. </s>
<s> " "lucan," saith king arthur, "so thought i ever again to have affiance in him, i would make him be set forth of my prison, for well i know that i have wrought discourteously toward him. </s>
<s>  and lancelot is of a great heart, wherefore would he not slacken of his despite for that which hath been done unto him until such time as he should be avenged thereof, for no king is there in the world, how puissant soever he be, against whom he durst not well maintain his right. </s>
<s> " iii. </s>
<s>  "sir," saith lucan, "lancelot well knoweth that and you had taken no counsel but your own, he would not have been thus entreated, and i dare well say that never so long as he liveth will he misdo in aught towards you, for he hath in him much valour and loyalty, as many a time have you had good cause to know. </s>
<s>  wherefore, and you would fain have aid and succour and hold your realm again, behoveth you set him forth of the prison, or otherwise never will you succeed herein,  if you do not so, you will lose your land by treason. </s>
<s> " the king held by the counsel of lucan the butler. </s>
<s>  he made bring lancelot before him into the midst of the hall, that was somewhat made ean of his being in prison, but he bore him as he wont, nor might none look at him to whom he seemed not to be good knight. </s>
<s>  "lancelot," saith the king, "how is it with you?" "sir," saith he, "it hath been ill with me long time,  please god, it shall be better hereafter. </s>
<s> " "lancelot," saith the king, "i repent me of this that i have done to you, and i have bethought me much of the good services i have found in you, wherefore i will do you amends thereof at your will, in such sort as that the love between us shall be whole as it was tofore. </s>
<s> " iv. </s>
<s>  "sir," saith lancelot, "your amends love i much, and your love more than of any other. </s>
<s>  but never, please god, will i misdo you for aught that you may have done to me, for it is well known that i have not been in prison for no treason i have done, nor for no folly, but only for that it was your will. </s>
<s>  never will it be reproached me as of shame,  sith that you have done me nought whereof i may have blame nor reproach, my devoir it is to withhold me from hating you. </s>
<s>  for you are my lord, and if that you do me ill, without flattery of myself the ill you do me is your own. </s>
<s>   please god, whatsoever you have done me, never shall my aid fail you, rather, everywhere will i set my body in adventure for your love, in like sort as i have done many a time. </s>
<s> " v. </s>
<s>  in the court of king arthur was right great joy of the most part when they heard that lancelot was set forth of prison, but not a whit rejoiced were briant and his folk. </s>
<s>  the king commanded that lancelot should be well cared for and made whole again, and that all should be at his commandment. </s>
<s>  the court was all overjoyed thereof, and they said: now at last might the king make war in good assurance. </s>
<s>  lancelot was foremost in the king's court and more redoubted than was ever another of the knights. </s>
<s>  briant of the isles came one day before the king. </s>
<s>  "sir," saith he, "behold, here is lancelot that wounded me in your service, wherefore i will that he know i am his enemy. </s>
<s> " "briant," saith lancelot, "and if that you deserved it tofore, well may you be sorry thereof, and sith that you wish to be mine enemy, your friend will i not be. </s>
<s>  for well may i deem of your love according as i have found it in you. </s>
<s> " "sir," saith briant to the king, "you are my lord, and i am one you are bound to protect. </s>
<s>  you know well that so rich am i in lands and so puissant in friends that i may well despise mine enemy, nor will i not remain at your court so long as lancelot is therein. </s>
<s>  say not that i depart thence with any shame as toward myself. </s>
<s>  rather thus go i hence as one that will gladly avenge me, so i have place and freedom, and i see plainly and know that you and your court love him far better than you love me, wherefore behoveth me take thought thereof. </s>
<s> " "briant," saith the king, "remain as yet, and i will make amends for you to lancelot, and i myself will make amends for him to you. </s>
<s> " vi. </s>
<s>  "sir," saith briant, "by the faith that i owe to you, none amends will i have of him nor other until such time as i have drawn as much blood of his body as did he of mine, and i will well that he know it. </s>
<s> " with that briant departeth from the court all wrathful, but if that lancelot had not feared to anger the king, briant would not have ridden a league english or ever he had followed and forced him to fight. </s>
<s>  briant goeth toward the castle of the hard rock, and saith that better would it have been for the king that lancelot were still in prison, for that such a plea will he move against him and he may bring it to bear, as that he shall lose thereof the best parcel of his land. </s>
<s>  he is gone into the land of king claudas, and saith that now at last hath he need of his aid, for lancelot is issued forth of the king's prison and is better loved at court than all other, so that the king believeth in no counsel save his only. </s>
<s>  king claudas sweareth unto him and maketh pledge that never will he fail him, and briant to him again. </s>
<s>  branch xxxv. </s>
<s>  title i. </s>
<s>  herewithal is the story silent of briant and talketh of perceval, that the ship beareth away right swiftly. </s>
<s>  but so long hath he held battle therein that every one hath he slain of them that were in the ship save only the pilot that steereth her, for him hath he in covenant that he will believe in god and renounce his evil law. </s>
<s>  perceval is far from land so that he seeth nought but sea only, and the ship speedeth onward, and god guideth him, as one that believeth in him and loveth him and serveth him of a good heart. </s>
<s>  the ship ran on by night and by day as it pleased god, until that they saw a castle and an island of the sea. </s>
<s>  he asked his pilot if he knew what castle it was. </s>
<s>  "certes," saith he, "not i, for so far have we run that i know not neither the sea nor the stars. </s>
<s> " they come nigh the castle, and saw four that sounded bells at the four corners of the town, right sweetly, and they that sounded them were clad in white garments. </s>
<s>  they are come thither. </s>
<s>  ii. </s>
<s>  so soon as the ship had taken haven under the castle, the sea withdraweth itself back, so that the ship is left on dry land. </s>
<s>  none were therein save perceval, his horse, and the pilot. </s>
<s>  they issued forth of the ship and went by the side of the sea toward the castle, and therein were the fairest halls and the fairest mansions that any might see ever. </s>
<s>  he looketh underneath a tree that was tall and broad and seeth the fairest fountain and the clearest that any may devise, and it was all surrounded of rich pillars, and the gravel thereof seemed to be gold and precious stones. </s>
<s>  above this fountain were two men sitting, their beards and hair whiter than driven snow, albeit they seemed young of visage. </s>
<s>  so soon as they saw perceval they dressed them to meet him, and bowed down and worshipped the shield that he bare at his neck, and kissed the cross and then the boss wherein were the hallows. </s>
<s>  "sir," say they, "marvel not of this that we do, for well knew we the knight that bare this shield tofore you. </s>
<s>  many a time we saw him or ever god were crucified. </s>
<s> " perceval marvelleth much of this that they say, for they talk of a time that is long agone. </s>
<s>  iii. </s>
<s>  "lords, know ye then how he was named?" say they, "joseph of abarimacie, but no cross was there on the shield before the death of jesus christ. </s>
<s>  but he had it set thereon after the crucifixion of jesus christ for the sake of the saviour that he loved so well. </s>
<s> " perceval took off the shield from his neck, and one of the worshipful men setteth upon it as it were a posy of herbs that was blooming with the fairest flowers in the world. </s>
<s>  perceval looketh beyond the fountain and seeth in a right fair place a round vessel like as it were ivory, and it was so large that there was a knight within, all armed. </s>
<s>  he looketh thereinto and seeth the knight, and speaketh unto him many times, but never the more willeth the knight to answer him. </s>
<s>  perceval looketh at him in wonderment, and cometh back to the good men and asketh them who is this knight, and they tell him that he may know not as yet. </s>
<s>  they lead him to a great hall and bear his shield before him, whereof they make right great joy, and show thereunto great worship. </s>
<s>  he seeth the hall right rich, for hall so rich and so fair had he seen never. </s>
<s>  it was hung about with right rich cloths of silk, and in the midst of the hall was imaged the saviour of the world so as he is in his majesty, with the apostles about him, and within were great galleries that were full of folk and seemed to be of great holiness, and so were they, for had they not been good men they might not there have remained. </s>
<s>  iv. </s>
<s>  "sir," say the two masters to perceval, "this house that you see here so rich, is the hall royal. </s>
<s> " "by my faith," saith perceval, "so ought it well to be, for never saw i none so much of worth. </s>
<s> " he looketh all around, and seeth the richest tables of gold and ivory that he saw ever. </s>
<s>  one of the masters clappeth his hands thrice, and three and thirty men come into the hall all in a company. </s>
<s>  they were clad in white garments, and not one of them but had a red cross in the midst of his breast, and they seemed to be all of an age. </s>
<s>  as soon as they enter into the hall they do worship to god our lord and set out their cups. </s>
<s>  then went they to wash at a great laver of gold, and then went to sit at the tables. </s>
<s>  the masters made perceval sit at the most master-table with themselves. </s>
<s>  they were served thereat right gloriously, and perceval looked about him more gladlier than he ate. </s>
<s>  v. </s>
<s>  and while he was thus looking, he seeth a chain of gold come down above him loaded with precious stones, and in the midst thereof was a crown of gold. </s>
<s>  the chain descended a great length and held on to nought save to the will of our lord only. </s>
<s>  as soon as the masters saw it descending they opened a great wide pit that was in the midst of the hall, so that one could see the hole all openly. </s>
<s>  as soon as the entrance of this pit was discovered, there issued thence the greatest cry and most dolorous that any heard ever, and when the worshipful men hear it, they stretched out their hands towards our lord and all began to weep. </s>
<s>  perceval heareth this dolour, and marvelleth much what it may be. </s>
<s>  he seeth that the chain of gold descendeth thither and is there stayed until they have well-nigh eaten, and then draweth itself again into the air and so goeth again aloft. </s>
<s>  but perceval knoweth not what became thereof, and the master covereth the pit again, that was right grisly to see, and pitiful to hear were the voices that issued therefrom. </s>
<s>  vi. </s>
<s>  the good men rose from the tables when they had eaten, and gave thanks right sweetly to our lord. </s>
<s>  and then returned thither whence they had come. </s>
<s>  "sir," saith the master to perceval, "the chain of gold that you have seen is right precious and the crown of gold likewise. </s>
<s>  but never may you issue forth from hence save you promise to return so soon as you shall see the ship and the sail crossed of a red cross. </s>
<s>  otherwise may you not depart hence. </s>
<s> " "tell me," saith he, "of the chain of gold and the crown, what it may be?" "we will tell you not," saith one of the masters, "save you promise that which i tell you. </s>
<s> " "certes, sir," saith perceval, "i promise you faithfully, that so soon as i shall have done that i have to do for my lady my mother and one other, that i will return hither, so i be on live and i see your ship so marked as you say. </s>
<s> " "yea, be you faithful to the end herein, and you shall have the crown of gold upon your head so soon as you return, and so shall you be seated in the throne, and shall be king of an island that is near to this, right plenteous of all things good, for nought is there in the world that is there lacking that is needful for man's body. </s>
<s>  king hermit was the king thereof that thus hath garnished it, and for that he approved himself so well in this kingdom, and that they who are in the island consented thereto, is he chosen to be king of a greater realm. </s>
<s>  now they desire that another worshipful man be sent them for king, that shall do for them as much good as did he, but take you good heed, sith that you will be king therein, that the island be well garnished. </s>
<s>  for, and you garnish it not well, you will be put into the poverty- stricken isl the crying whereof you have but now since heard, and the crown thereof will again be reft from you. </s>
<s>  for they that have been kings of the plenteous island and have not well approved them, are among the folk that you saw in the poverty- stricken isl lacking in all things good. </s>
<s>  and so i tell you that king hermit, whom you will succeed, hath sent thither a great part of his folk. </s>
<s>  there are the heads sealed in silver, and the heads sealed in lead, and the bodies whereunto these heads belonged. </s>
<s>  i tell you that you must make come thither the head both of the king and of the queen. </s>
<s>  but of the other i tell you that they are in the poverty-stricken island. </s>
<s>  but we know not whether they shall ever issue forth thence. </s>
<s> " vii. </s>
<s>  "sir," saith perceval, "tell me of the knight that is all armed in the ivory vessel, who he is, and what is the name of this castle?" "you may not know," saith the master, "until your return. </s>

<s> " "sir," saith perceval, "most willingly shall i return, nor never would i have sought to depart but for my lady my mother, and for my sister, for never have i seen no place that so much hath pleased me. </s>
<s> " he was right well harboured the night within, and in the morning, or ever he departed, heard a holy mass in a holy chapel the fairest that he had seen ever. </s>
<s>  the master cometh to him after the mass and bringeth him a shield as white as snow. </s>
<s>  afterwards, he saith, "you will leave me your shield within for token of your coming and will bear this. </s>
<s> " "sir," saith perceval, "i will do your pleasure. </s>
<s> " he hath taken leave, and so departeth from the rich mansion, and findeth the ship all apparelled, and heareth sound the bells at his forth-going the same as at his coming. </s>
<s>  he entereth into the ship and the sail is set. </s>
<s>  he leaveth the land far behind, and the pilot steereth the ship and our lord god guideth and leadeth him. </s>
<s>  the ship runneth a great speed, for far enough had she to run, but god made her speed as he would, for he knew the passing great goodness and worth of the knight that was within. </s>
<s>  viii. </s>
<s>  god hath guided and led the ship by day and by night until that she arrived at an island where was a castle right ancient, but it seemed not to be over-rich, rather it showed as had it been of great lordship in days of yore. </s>
<s>  they cast anchor, and perceval is come toward the castle and entereth in all armed. </s>

<s>  she rose up as soon as she saw him, but she was right poorly clad. </s>

<s>  no knight have i seen enter this castle of a long time. </s>

<s> " she leadeth him into a great ancient hall that was right poorly garnished. </s>
<s>  "sir," saith she, "here will you harbour you the night, and you would take in good part that we may do and you knew the plight of this castle. </s>
<s> " she maketh him be unarmed of a servant that was there within, and the damsels come before him and serve him right sweetly. </s>
<s>  the lady bringeth him a mantle to do on. </s>
<s>  "sir," saith she, "within are no better garments wherewith to show you honour than this. </s>
<s> " perceval looketh on the damsels and hath great pity of them, for so well shapen were they of limb and body as that nature might not have better fashioned them, and all the beauty that may be in woman's body was in them, and all the sweetness and simpleness. </s>
<s>  ix. </s>
<s>  "lady," saith perceval, "is this castle, then, not yours?" "sir," saith she, "so much is all that remaineth unto me of all my l and you see there my daughters of whom is it right sore pity, for nought have they but what you see, albeit gentlewomen are they and of high lineage, but their kinsfolk are too far away, and a knight that is right cruel hath reft us of our land sithence that my lord was dead, and holdeth a son of mine in his prison, whereof i am right sorrowful, for he is one of the comeliest knights in the world. </s>
<s>  he had not been knight more than four years when he took him, and now may i aid neither myself nor other, but i have heard tell that there is a knight in the land of wales that was the son of alain li gros of the valleys of camelot, and he is the best knight in the world, and this alain was brother of calobrutus, whose wife was i, and of whom i had my son and these two daughters. </s>
<s>  this know i well, that and the good knight that is so near akin to them were by any adventure to come into this isl i should have my son again, and my daughters that are disherited would have their lands again freely, and so should i be brought out of sore pain and poverty. </s>
<s>  i am of another lineage that is full far away, for king ban of benoic that is dead was mine uncle, but he hath a son that is a right good knight as i have been told, so that and one of these two should come nigh me in any of these islands right joyous should i be thereof. </s>
<s> " x. </s>
<s>  perceval heareth that the two damsels are his uncle's daughters, and hath great pity thereof. </s>
<s>  "lady," saith he, "how is he named that is in prison?" "sir," saith she, "galobruns, and he that holdeth him in prison is named gohaz of the castle of the whale. </s>

<s>  "sir, there is but an arm of the sea to cross, and in all these islands of the sea is there none that hath any puissance but he only, and so assured is he that no dread hath he of any. </s>
<s>  for none that is in this land durst offend against him. </s>

<s> " "lady," saith perceval, "an oath is not always kept. </s>
<s>  to the two damsels, please god, shall he do no shame, and right heavy am i of that he hath done already, for they were daughters of mine uncle. </s>
<s>  alain li gros was my father and galobrutus my uncle, and many another good man that now is dead. </s>
<s> " xi. </s>

<s>  and he saith that he will not depart from their land until he hath done all he may. </s>

<s>  so he prayeth god grant him that he may be able to give them back their land and bring them out of the poverty wherein they are. </s>

<s>  he findeth within one of the comeliest knights in the world. </s>
<s>  he had a ring at his feet and a collar on his neck with a chain whereof the other end was fixed by a staple into a great ledge of the rock. </s>
<s>  he rose up over against perceval as soon as he saw him. </s>

<s> " "sir, that irketh me," saith the knight, "better should i like myself elsewhere than here. </s>
<s> " "you would be right," saith perceval, "for you are in right evil plight in the midst of this sea. </s>
<s>  have you aught within to eat or to drink?" "sir," saith he, "the daughter of the sick knight that dwelleth in the island hard by, sendeth me every day in a boat as much meat as i may eat, for she hath great pity of me. </s>
<s>  the king that hath imprisoned me here hath reft her castles like as he hath those of my lady my mother. </s>

<s> " xii. </s>
<s>  when galobruns heareth that he is his uncle's son, great joy hath he thereof. </s>

<s> " the king had great shame of this that the damsel told him, and made answer never a word. </s>
<s>  perceval understandeth that it was he that held his cousin in prison, and is issued from the ship forthwith, sword drawn. </s>

<s>  perceval thrusteth his sword right through the gullet. </s>

<s>  the king cometh down, that hath no dread of aught, but cometh, rather, as he ought, to thank perceval of the goodness he had done him, and perceval seizeth him between his arms and beareth him away to the ship. </s>

<s>  "sir knight," saith gohaz, "take heed what you do, for i am king of this land. </s>
<s> " "therefore," saith perceval, "i do it. </s>
<s>  for, had it been another i should do it not. </s>

<s>  xv. </s>

<s>  joseus, the son of king pelles, slew his mother there. </s>

<s> " perceval marvelleth much, and knew well that it was the castle of king hermit his uncle. </s>

<s>  the sea was calm and untroubled, and he made cast the anchor so as to keep the ship steady. </s>

<s>  they were all brothers-german, and right worshipful men, and none thereof lived more than twelve years knight save one only, and none of them was there but won much land and broad kingdoms from the misbelievers, and they all died in arms. </s>

<s> " "sir," saith perceval, "sith that she is yours, you have a right to do your pleasure, but in all things ought one to be heedful on one's way. </s>

<s>  he returned back to castle perilous, and the damsel made great joy thereof when she understood that he had slain brundans. </s>
<s>  perceval lay there that night, and departed on the morrow after that he had heard mass. </s>
<s>  when he came forth of the castle he met the knight by whom he had sent the cup to the sick knight's wife. </s>
<s>  perceval asketh how it is with him. </s>
<s>  "sir, saith he, "i have carried out your message right well, for never was a thing received with such good will. </s>
<s>  the sick knight hath forgone his grudge against his wife. </s>
<s>  she eateth at his table, and the household do her commandment. </s>
<s> " "this liketh me right well," saith perceval, "and i thank you of doing this errand. </s>
<s> " "sir," saith the knight, "no thing is there i would not do for you, for that you made my brother knight hardy there where you first saw him knight coward. </s>
<s> " "sir," saith perceval, "good knight was your brother and a right good end he made, but a little it forthinketh me that he might have still been living had he abided in his cowardize. </s>
<s> " "sir," saith he, "better is he dead, sith that he died with honour, than that he should live with shame. </s>
<s>  yet glad was i not of his death, for a hardy knight he was, and yet more would have been, had he lived longer. </s>
<s> " xxvi. </s>
<s>  perceval departeth from the knight and commendeth him to god. </s>
<s>  he hath wandered so far one day and another that he is returned to his own most holy castle, and findeth therein his mother and his sister that the damsel of the car had brought thither. </s>
<s>  the widow lady had made bear thither the body that lay in the coffin before the castle of camelot in the rich chapel that she had builded there. </s>
<s>  his sister brought the cerecloth that she took in the waste chapel, and presented there where the graal was. </s>
<s>  perceval made bring the coffin of the other knight that was at the entrance of his castle within the chapel likewise, and place it beside the coffin of his uncle, nor never thereafter might it be removed. </s>
<s>  josephus telleth us that perceval was in this castle long time, nor never once moved therefrom in quest of no adventure. </s>
<s>  rather was his courage so attorned to the saviour of the world and his sweet mother, that he and his sister and the damsel that was therein led a holy life and a religious. </s>
<s>  therein abode they even as it pleased god, until that his mother passed away and his sister and all they that were therein save he alone. </s>
<s>  the hermits that were nigh the castle buried them and sang their masses, and came every day and took counsel of him for the holiness they saw him do and the good life that he led there. </s>
<s>  so one day whilst he was in the holy chapel where the hallows were, forthwith, behold you, a voice that cometh down therein: "perceval," saith the voice, "not long shall you abide herein. </s>
<s>  wherefore it is god's will that you dispart the hallows amongst the hermits of the forest, there where these bodies shall be served and worshipped, and the most holy graal shall appear herein no more, but within a brief space shall you know well the place where it shall be. </s>
<s> " when the voice departed, all the coffins that were therein crashed so passing loud that it seemed the master-hall had fallen. </s>
<s>  he crosseth and blesseth him and commendeth him to god. </s>
<s>  on a day the hermits came to him. </s>
<s>  he disparted the holy relics among them, and they builded above them holy churches and houses of religion that are seen in the lands and in the islands. </s>
<s>  joseus the son of king hermit, remained therein with perceval, for he well knew that he would be departing thence betimes. </s>
<s>  xxvii. </s>
<s>  perceval heard one day a bell sound loud and high without the manor toward the sea. </s>
<s>  he came to the windows of the hall and saw the ship come with the white sail and the red cross thereon, and within were the fairest folk that ever he might behold, and they were all robed in such manner as though they should sing mass. </s>
<s>  when the ship was anchored under the hall they went to pray in the most holy chapel. </s>
<s>  they brought the richest vessels of gold and silver that any might ever see, like as it were coffins, and set therein one of the three bodies of knights that had been brought into the chapel, and the body of king fisherman, and of the mother of perceval. </s>
<s>  but no savour in the world smelleth so sweet. </s>
<s>  perceval took leave of joseus and commended him to the saviour of the world, and took leave of the household, from whom he departed in like manner. </s>
<s>  the worshipful men that were in the ship signed them of the cross and blessed them likewise. </s>
<s>  the ship wherein perceval was drew far away, and a voice that issued from the manor as she departed commended them to god and to his sweet mother. </s>
<s>  josephus recordeth us that perceval departed in such wise, nor never thereafter did no earthly man know what became of him, nor doth the history speak of him more. </s>
<s>  but the history telleth us that joseus abode in the castle that had been king fisherman's, and shut himself up therein so that none might enter, and lived upon that the lord god might send him. </s>
<s>  he dwelt there long time after that perceval had departed, and ended therein. </s>
<s>  after his end, the dwelling began to fall. </s>
<s>  natheless never was the chapel wasted nor decayed, but was as whole thereafter as tofore and is so still. </s>
<s>  the place was far from folk, and the place seemed withal to be somewhat different. </s>
<s>  when it was fallen into decay, many folk of the lands and islands that were nighest thereunto marvel them what may be in this manor. </s>
<s>  they dare a many that they should go see what was therein, and sundry folk went thither from all the lands, but none durst never enter there again save two welsh knights that had heard tell of it. </s>
<s>  full comely knights they were, young and joyous hearted. </s>
<s>  so either pledged him to other that they would go thither by way of gay adventure. </s>
<s>  but therein remained they of a long space after, and when again they came forth they led the life of hermits, and clad them in hair shirts, and went by the forest and so ate nought save roots only, and led a right hard life. </s>
<s>  yet ever they made as though they were glad, and if that any should ask whereof they rejoiced in such wise, "go," said they to them that asked, "thither where we have been, and you shall know the wherefore. </s>
<s> " in such sort made they answer to the folk. </s>
<s>  these two knights died in this holy life, nor were none other tidings never brought thence by them. </s>
<s>  they of that land called them saints. </s>
<s>  xxviii. </s>
<s>  here endeth the story of the most holy graal. </s>
<s>  josephus, by whom it is placed on record, giveth the benison of our lord to all that hear and honour it. </s>
<s>  the latin from whence this history was drawn into romance was taken in the isle of avalon, in a holy house of religion that standeth at the head of the moors adventurous, there where king arthur and queen guenievre lie, according to the witness of the good men religious that are therein, that have the whole history thereof, true from the beginning even to the end. </s>
<s>  after this same history beginneth the story how briant of the isles renounced king arthur on account of lancelot whom he loved not, and how he assured king claudas that reft king ban of benoic of his land. </s>
<s>  this story telleth how he conquered him and by what means, and how galobrus of the red launde came to king arthur's court to help lancelot, for that he was of his lineage. </s>
<s>  this story is right long and right adventurous and weighty, but the book will now forthwith be silent thereof until another time. </s>
<s>  the author's conclusion for the lord of neele made the lord of cambrein this book be written, that never tofore was treated in romance but one single time besides this. </s>
<s>  and the book that was made tofore this is so ancient that only with great pains may one make out the letter. </s>
<s>  and let messire johan de neele well understand that he ought to hold this story dear, nor ought he tell nought thereof to ill- understanding folk, for a good thing that is squandered upon bad folk is never remembered by them for good. </s>

<s>  "you say that the women of our society live for a different interest from that which actuates fallen women. </s>
<s>  and i say no, and i am going to prove it to you. </s>
<s>  if beings differ from one another according to the purpose of their life, according to their inner life, this will necessarily be reflected also in their outer life, and their exterior will be very different. </s>
<s>  well, then, compare the wretched, the despised, with the women of the highest society: the same dresses, the same fashions, the same perfumeries, the same passion for jewelry, for brilliant and very expensive articles, the same amusements, dances, music, and songs. </s>
<s>  the former attract by all possible means. </s>
<s>  so do the latter. </s>
<s>  no difference, none whatever! "yes, and i, too, was captivated by jerseys, bustles, and curly hair. </s>
<s>   chapter vii. </s>
<s>  "and it was very easy to capture me, since i was brought up under artificial conditions, like cucumbers in a hothouse. </s>
<s>  our too abundant nourishment, together with complete physical idleness, is nothing but systematic excitement of the imagination. </s>
<s>  the men of our society are fed and kept like reproductive stallions. </s>
<s>  it is sufficient to close the valve,--that is, for a young man to live a quiet life for some time,--to produce as an immediate result a restlessness, which, becoming exaggerated by reflection through the prism of our unnatural life, provokes the illusion of love. </s>
<s>  "all our idyls and marriage, all, are the result for the most part of our eating. </s>
<s>  does that astonish you? for my part, i am astonished that we do not see it. </s>
<s>  not far from my estate this spring some moujiks were working on a railway embankment. </s>
<s>  you know what a peasant's food is,--bread, kvass, onions. </s>
<s>  with this frugal nourishment he lives, he is alert, he makes light work in the fields. </s>
<s>  but on the railway this bill of fare becomes cacha and a pound of meat. </s>
<s>  only he restores this meat by sixteen hours of labor pushing loads weighing twelve hundred pounds. </s>
<s>  kvass, a sort of cider. </s>
<s>  "and we, who eat two pounds of meat and game, we who absorb all sorts of heating drinks and food, how do we expend it? in sensual excesses. </s>
<s>  if the valve is open, all goes well. </s>
<s>  but close it, as i had closed it temporarily before my marriage, and immediately there will result an excitement which, deformed by novels, verses, music, by our idle and luxurious life, will give a love of the finest water. </s>
<s>  i, too, fell in love, as everybody does, and there were transports, emotions, poesy. </s>
<s>  but really all this passion was prepared by mamma and the dressmakers. </s>
<s>  if there had been no trips in boats, no well-fitted garments, etc. </s>
<s> , if my wife had worn some shapeless blouse, and i had seen her thus at her home, i should not have been seduced. </s>
<s>   chapter viii. </s>
<s>  "and note, also, this falsehood, of which all are guilty. </s>
<s>  the way in which marriages are made. </s>
<s>  what could there be more natural? the young girl is marriageable, she should marry. </s>
<s>  what simpler, provided the young person is not a monster, and men can be found with a desire to marry? well, no, here begins a new hypocrisy. </s>
<s>  "formerly, when the maiden arrived at a favorable age, her marriage was arranged by her parents. </s>
<s>  that was done, that is done still, throughout humanity, among the chinese, the hindoos, the mussulmans, and among our common people also. </s>
<s>  things are so managed in at least ninety-nine per cent. </s>
<s>  of the families of the entire human race. </s>
<s>  "only we riotous livers have imagined that this way was bad, and have invented another. </s>
<s>  and this other,--what is it? it is this. </s>
<s>  the young girls are seated, and the gentlemen walk up and down before them, as in a bazaar, and make their choice. </s>
<s>  the maidens wait and think, but do not dare to say: 'take me, young man, me and not her. </s>
<s>  look at these shoulders and the rest. </s>
<s> ' we males walk up and down, and estimate the merchandise, and then we discourse upon the rights of woman, upon the liberty that she acquires, i know not how, in the theatrical halls. </s>
<s> " "but what is to be done?" said i to him. </s>
<s>  "shall the woman make the advances?" "i do not know. </s>
<s>   if it is a question of equality, let the equality be complete. </s>
<s>  though it has been found that to contract marriages through the agency of match-makers is humiliating, it is nevertheless a thousand times preferable to our system. </s>
<s>  there the rights and the chances are equal. </s>
<s>  here the woman is a slave, exhibited in the market. </s>
<s>  but as she cannot bend to her condition, or make advances herself, there begins that other and more abominable lie which is sometimes called going into society, sometimes amusing one's self, and which is really nothing but the hunt for a husband. </s>
<s>  "but say to a mother or to her daughter that they are engaged only in a hunt for a husband. </s>
<s>  god! what an offence! yet they can do nothing else, and have nothing else to do. </s>
<s>  and the terrible feature of it all is to see sometimes very young, poor, and innocent maidens haunted solely by such ideas. </s>
<s>  if only, i repeat, it were done frankly. </s>
<s>  but it is always accompanied with lies and babble of this sort:-- "'ah, the descent of species! how interesting it is!' "'oh, lily is much interested in painting. </s>
<s> ' "'shall you go to the exposition? how charming it is!' "'and the troika, and the plays, and the symphony. </s>
<s>  ah, how adorable!' "'my lise is passionately fond of music. </s>
<s> ' "'and you, why do you not share these convictions?' "and through all this verbiage, all have but one single idea: 'take me, take my lise. </s>
<s>  no, me! only try!"'  chapter ix. </s>
<s>  "do you know," suddenly continued posdnicheff, "that this power of women from which the world suffers arises solely from what i have just spoken of?" "what do you mean by the power of women?" i said. </s>
<s>  "everybody, on the contrary, complains that women have not sufficient rights, that they are in subjection. </s>
<s> " "that's it. </s>
<s>  that's it exactly," said he, vivaciously. </s>
<s>  "that is just what i mean, and that is the explanation of this extraordinary phenomenon, that on the one hand woman is reduced to the lowest degree of humiliation and on the other hand she reigns over everything. </s>
<s>  see the jews: with their power of money, they avenge their subjection, just as the women do. </s>
<s>  'ah! you wish us to be only merchants? all right. </s>
<s>  remaining merchants, we will get possession of you,' say the jews. </s>
<s>  'ah! you wish us to be only objects of sensuality? all right. </s>
<s>  by the aid of sensuality we will bend you beneath our yoke,' say the women. </s>
<s>  "the absence of the rights of woman does not consist in the fact that she has not the right to vote, or the right to sit on the bench, but in the fact that in her affectional relations she is not the equal of man, she has not the right to abstain, to choose instead of being chosen. </s>
<s>  you say that that would be abnormal. </s>
<s>  very well! but then do not let man enjoy these rights, while his companion is deprived of them, and finds herself obliged to make use of the coquetry by which she governs, so that the result is that man chooses 'formally,' whereas really it is woman who chooses. </s>
<s>  as soon as she is in possession of her means, she abuses them, and acquires a terrible supremacy. </s>
<s> " "but where do you see this exceptional power?" "where? why, everywhere, in everything. </s>
<s>  go see the stores in the large cities. </s>
<s>  there are millions there, millions. </s>
<s>  it is impossible to estimate the enormous quantity of labor that is expended there. </s>
<s>  in nine-tenths of these stores is there anything whatever for the use of men? all the luxury of life is demanded and sustained by woman. </s>
<s>  count the factories. </s>
<s>  the greater part of them are engaged in making feminine ornaments. </s>
<s>  millions of men, generations of slaves, die toiling like convicts simply to satisfy the whims of our companions. </s>
<s>  "women, like queens, keep nine-tenths of the human race as prisoners of war, or as prisoners at hard labor. </s>
<s>  and all this because they have been humiliated, because they have been deprived of rights equal to those which men enjoy. </s>
<s>  they take revenge for our sensuality. </s>
<s>  they catch us in their nets. </s>
<s>  "yes, the whole thing is there. </s>
<s>  women have made of themselves such a weapon to act upon the senses that a young man, and even an old man, cannot remain tranquil in their presence. </s>
<s>  watch a popular festival, or our receptions or ball-rooms. </s>
<s>  woman well knows her influence there. </s>
<s>  you will see it in her triumphant smiles. </s>
<s>  "as soon as a young man advances toward a woman, directly he falls under the influence of this opium, and loses his head. </s>
<s>  long ago i felt ill at ease when i saw a woman too well adorned,--whether a woman of the people with her red neckerchief and her looped skirt, or a woman of our own society in her ball-room dress. </s>
<s>  but now it simply terrifies me. </s>
<s>  i see in it a danger to men, something contrary to the laws. </s>
<s>  and i feel a desire to call a policeman, to appeal for defence from some quarter, to demand that this dangerous object be removed. </s>
<s>  "and this is not a joke, by any means. </s>
<s>  i am convinced, i am sure, that the time will come--and perhaps it is not far distant--when the world will understand this, and will be astonished that a society could exist in which actions as harmful as those which appeal to sensuality by adorning the body as our companions do were allowed. </s>
<s>  as well set traps along our public streets, or worse than that. </s>
<s>   chapter x. </s>
<s>  "that, then, was the way in which i was captured. </s>
<s>  i was in love, as it is called. </s>
<s>  not only did she appear to me a perfect being, but i considered myself a white blackbird. </s>
<s>  it is a commonplace fact that there is no one so low in the world that he cannot find some one viler than himself, and consequently puff with pride and self-contentment. </s>
<s>  i was in that situation. </s>
<s>  i did not marry for money. </s>
<s>  interest was foreign to the affair, unlike the marriages of most of my acquaintances, who married either for money or for relations. </s>
<s>  first, i was rich, she was poor. </s>
<s>  second, i was especially proud of the fact that, while others married with an intention of continuing their polygamic life as bachelors, it was my firm intention to live monogamically after my engagement and the wedding, and my pride swelled immeasurably. </s>
<s>  "yes, i was a wretch, convinced that i was an angel. </s>
<s>  the period of my engagement did not last long. </s>
<s>  i cannot remember those days without shame. </s>
<s>  what an abomination! "it is generally agreed that love is a moral sentiment, a community of thought rather than of sense. </s>
<s>  if that is the case, this community of thought ought to find expression in words and conversation. </s>
<s>  nothing of the sort. </s>
<s>  it was extremely difficult for us to talk with each other. </s>
<s>  what a toil of sisyphus was our conversation! scarcely had we thought of something to say, and said it, when we had to r‚sum‚ our silence and try to discover new subjects. </s>
<s>  literally, we did not know what to say to each other. </s>
<s>  all that we could think of concerning the life that was before us and our home was said. </s>
<s>  "and then what? if we had been animals, we should have known that we had not to talk. </s>
<s>  but here, on the contrary, it was necessary to talk, and there were no resources! for that which occupied our minds was not a thing to be expressed in words. </s>
<s>  "and then that silly custom of eating bon-bons, that brutal gluttony for sweetmeats, those abominable preparations for the wedding, those discussions with mamma upon the apartments, upon the sleeping-rooms, upon the bedding, upon the morning-gowns, upon the wrappers, the linen, the costumes! understand that if people married according to the old fashion, as this old man said just now, then these eiderdown coverlets and this bedding would all be sacred details. </s>
<s>  but with us, out of ten married people there is scarcely to be found one who, i do not say believes in sacraments , he said, "why did you almost crush the life out of the old grandmother? be more gentle. </s>
<s>  i have plenty more, and i will give them to you. </s>
<s> " whereupon he began throwing about more of the coins. </s>
<s>  the people gathered around him, and ivan continued throwing until he emptied his bag. </s>
<s>  they clamored for more, but ivan replied: "the gold is all gone. </s>
<s>  another time i will give you more. </s>
<s>  now we will r‚sum‚ our singing and dancing. </s>
<s> " the little children sang, but ivan said to them, "your songs are no good. </s>
<s> " the children said, "then show us how to sing better. </s>
<s> " to this ivan replied, "i will show you people who can sing better than you. </s>
<s> " with that remark ivan went to the barn  securing a bundle of straw, did as the little devil had directed him. </s>
<s>  and presently a regiment of soldiers appeared in the village street, and he ordered them to sing and dance. </s>
<s>  the people were astonished and could not understand how ivan had produced the strangers. </s>
<s>  the soldiers sang for some time, to the great delight of the villagers. </s>
<s>  and when ivan commanded them to stop they instantly ceased. </s>
<s>  ivan then ordered them off to the barn, telling the astonished and mystified moujiks that they must not follow him. </s>
<s>  reaching the barn, he turned the soldiers again into straw and went home to sleep off the effects of his debauch. </s>
<s>   chapter vii. </s>
<s>  the next morning ivan's exploits were the talk of the village, and news of the wonderful things he had done reached the ears of his brother simeon, who immediately went to ivan to learn all about it. </s>
<s>  "explain to me," he said. </s>
<s>  "from whence did you bring the soldiers, and where did you take them?" "and what do you wish to know for?" asked ivan. </s>
<s>  "why, with soldiers we can do almost anything we wish--whole kingdoms can be conquered," replied simeon. </s>
<s>  this information greatly surprised ivan, who said: "well, why did you not tell me about this before? i can make as many as you want. </s>
<s> " ivan then took his brother to the barn, but he said: "while i am willing to create the soldiers, you must take them away from here. </s>
<s>  for if it should become necessary to feed them, all the food in the village would last them only one day. </s>
<s> " simeon promised to do as ivan wished, whereupon ivan proceeded to convert the straw into soldiers. </s>
<s>  out of one bundle of straw he made an entire regiment. </s>
<s>  in fact, so many soldiers appeared as if by magic that there was not a vacant spot in the field. </s>
<s>  turning to simeon ivan said, "well, is there a sufficient number?" beaming with joy, simeon replied: "enough! enough! thank you, ivan!" "glad you are satisfied," said ivan, "and if you wish more i will make them for you. </s>
<s>  i have plenty of straw now. </s>
<s> " simeon divided his soldiers into battalions and regiments, and after having drilled them he went forth to fight and to conquer. </s>
<s>  simeon had just gotten safely out of the village with his soldiers when tarras, the other brother, appeared before ivan--he also having heard of the previous day's performance and wanting to learn the secret of his power. </s>
<s>  he sought ivan, saying: "tell me the secret of your supply of gold, for if i had plenty of money i could with its assistance gather in all the wealth in the world. </s>
<s> " ivan was greatly surprised on hearing this statement, and said: "you might have told me this before, for i can obtain for you as much money as you wish. </s>
<s> " tarras was delighted, and he said, "you might get me about three bushels. </s>
<s> " "well," said ivan, "we will go to the woods, or, better still, we will harness the horse, as we could not possibly carry so much money ourselves. </s>
<s> " the brothers went to the woods and ivan proceeded to gather the oak leaves, which he rubbed between his hands, the dust falling to the ground and turning into gold pieces as quickly as it fell. </s>
<s>  when quite a pile had accumulated ivan turned to tarras and asked if he had rubbed enough leaves into money, whereupon tarras replied: "thank you, ivan. </s>
<s>  that will be sufficient for this time. </s>
<s> " ivan then said: "if you wish more, come to me and i will rub as much as you want, for there are plenty of leaves. </s>

<s> " they limped painfully down the bank, and once the foremost of the two men staggered among the rough-strewn rocks. </s>
<s>  they were tired and weak, and their faces had the drawn expression of patience which comes of hardship long endured. </s>
<s>  they were heavily burdened with blanket packs which were strapped to their shoulders. </s>
<s>  head- straps, passing across the forehead, helped support these packs. </s>
<s>   each man carried a rifle. </s>
<s>  they walked in a stooped posture, the shoulders well forward, the head still farther forward, the eyes bent upon the ground. </s>
<s>  "i wish we had just about two of them cartridges that's layin' in that cache of ourn," said the second man. </s>
<s>  his voice was utterly and drearily expressionless. </s>
<s>  he spoke without enthusiasm. </s>
<s>  and the first man, limping into the milky stream that foamed over the rocks, vouchsafed no reply. </s>
<s>  the other man followed at his heels. </s>

<s>  in places the water dashed against their knees, and both men staggered for footing. </s>

<s>  he seemed faint and dizzy and put out his free hand while he reeled, as though seeking support against the air. </s>
<s>  when he had steadied himself he stepped forward, but reeled again and nearly fell. </s>

<s>  then he called out: "i say, bill, i have sprained my ankle. </s>
<s> " bill staggered on through the milky water. </s>
<s>  he did not look around. </s>
<s>   the man watched him go, and though his face was expressionless as ever, his eyes were like the eyes of a wounded deer. </s>
<s>  the other man limped up the farther bank and continued straight on without looking back. </s>
<s>  the man in the stream watched him. </s>

<s>  his tongue even strayed out to moisten them. </s>
<s>  "bill!" he cried out. </s>

<s>  he watched him go till he passed over the crest and disappeared. </s>
<s>  then he turned his gaze and slowly took in the circle of the world that remained to him now that bill was gone. </s>

<s>  the man pulled out his watch, the while resting his weight on one leg. </s>
<s>  it was four o'clock, and as the season was near the last of july or first of august, - he did not know the precise date within a week or two, - he knew that the sun roughly marked the northwest. </s>

<s>  also, he knew that in that direction the arctic circle cut its forbidding way across the canadian barrens. </s>
<s>  this stream in which he stood was a feeder to the coppermine river, which in turn flowed north and emptied into coronation gulf and the arctic ocean. </s>
<s>  he had never been there, but he had seen it, once, on a hudson bay company chart. </s>
<s>  again his gaze completed the circle of the world about him. </s>

<s>  everywhere was soft sky-line. </s>
<s>  the hills were all low-lying. </s>
