<s>  "bill!" he cowered in the midst of the milky water, as though the vastness were pressing in upon him with overwhelming force, brutally crushing him with its complacent awfulness. </s>

<s>   this served to rouse him. </s>

<s>  though alone, he was not lost. </s>

<s>  in the mouth the water melts away and the seed chews sharp and bitter. </s>
<s>  the man knew there was no nourishment in the berries, but he chewed them patiently with a hope greater than knowledge and defying experience. </s>

<s>  it meant cessation, rest. </s>

<s>  john messner clung with mittened hand to the bucking gee-pole and held the sled in the trail. </s>
<s>  with the other mittened hand he rubbed his cheeks and nose. </s>
<s>  he rubbed his cheeks and nose every little while. </s>
<s>  in point of fact, he rarely ceased from rubbing them, and sometimes, as their numbness increased, he rubbed fiercely. </s>
<s>  his forehead was covered by the visor of his fur cap, the flaps of which went over his ears. </s>
<s>  the rest of his face was protected by a thick beard, golden-brown under its coating of frost. </s>
<s>  behind him churned a heavily loaded yukon sled, and before him toiled a string of five dogs. </s>
<s>  the rope by which they dragged the sled rubbed against the side of messner's leg. </s>
<s>  when the dogs swung on a bend in the trail, he stepped over the rope. </s>
<s>  there were many bends, and he was compelled to step over it often. </s>
<s>  sometimes he tripped on the rope, or stumbled, and at all times he was awkward, betraying a weariness so great that the sled now and again ran upon his heels. </s>
<s>  when he came to a straight piece of trail, where the sled could get along for a moment without guidance, he let go the gee-pole and batted his right hand sharply upon the hard wood. </s>
<s>  he found it difficult to keep up the circulation in that hand. </s>
<s>  but while he pounded the one h he never ceased from rubbing his nose and cheeks with the other. </s>
<s>  "it's too cold to travel, anyway," he said. </s>
<s>  he spoke aloud, after the manner of men who are much by themselves. </s>
<s>  "only a fool would travel at such a temperature. </s>
<s>  if it isn't eighty below, it's because it's seventy-nine. </s>
<s> " he pulled out his watch, and after some fumbling got it back into the breast pocket of his thick woollen jacket. </s>
<s>  then he surveyed the heavens and ran his eye along the white sky-line to the south. </s>
<s>  "twelve o'clock," he mumbled, "a clear sky, and no sun. </s>
<s> " he plodded on silently for ten minutes, and then, as though there had been no lapse in his speech, he added: "and no ground covered, and it's too cold to travel. </s>
<s> " suddenly he yelled "whoa!" at the dogs, and stopped. </s>
<s>  he seemed in a wild panic over his right h and proceeded to hammer it furiously against the gee-pole. </s>
<s>  "you - poor - devils!" he addressed the dogs, which had dropped down heavily on the ice to rest. </s>

<s>  this sort of contempt for eminences, or rather dread of the labor of ascending them, might have been termed the besetting weakness of the warfare of the period. </s>
<s>  it originated in the simplicity of the indian contests, in which, from the nature of the combats, and the density of the forests, fortresses were rare, and artillery next to useless. </s>
<s>  the carelessness engendered by these usages descended even to the war of the revolution and lost the states the important fortress of ticonderoga opening a way for the army of burgoyne into what was then the bosom of the country. </s>

<s> "--midsummer night's dream notwithstanding the high resolution of hawkeye he fully comprehended all the difficulties and danger he was about to incur. </s>
<s>  in his return to the camp, his acute and practised intellects were intently engaged in devising means to counteract a watchfulness and suspicion on the part of his enemies, that he knew were, in no degree, inferior to his own. </s>

<s>  as he approached the buildings, his steps become more deliberate, and his vigilant eye suffered no sign, whether friendly or hostile, to escape him. </s>

<s>  a faint light glimmered through its cracks, however, and announced that, notwithstanding its imperfect structure, it was not without a tenant. </s>

<s>  however implicit the faith of david was in the performance of ancient miracles, he eschewed the belief of any direct supernatural agency in the management of modern morality. </s>
<s>  in other words, while he had implicit faith in the ability of balaam's ass to speak, he was somewhat skeptical on the subject of a bear's singing. </s>

<s>  in this delicate and arduous situation, the crafty native had neglected no means of increasing his influence. </s>

<s> "--much ado about nothing the tribe, or rather half tribe, of delawares, which has been so often mentioned, and whose present place of encampment was so nigh the temporary village of the hurons, could assemble about an equal number of warriors with the latter people. </s>

<s>  4. </s>
<s>  democritus, pythagoras, bacon. </s>
<s>  state the relation between them. </s>
<s>  in what terms must the objective world ultimately be stated? why? 5. </s>
<s>  experience is the result of time and space being included in the nature of mind. </s>
<s>  discuss this. </s>
<s>  6. </s>
<s>  nihil est in intellectu quod non prius fuerit in sensibus. </s>
<s>  whose doctrine? discuss it. </s>
<s>  7. </s>
<s>  what is the inherent limitation in all ancient philosophy? who first removed it? 8. </s>
<s>  mind is expressed through what? matter through what? is speech the result or the cause of thought? 9. </s>
<s>  discuss the nature of the ego. </s>
<s>  10. </s>
<s>  according to plato, locke,Êberkeley, where would the sweetness of a honeycomb reside? where would its shape? its weight? where do you think these properties reside? ten questions, and no epicharmos of kos. </s>
<s>  but no examination paper asks everything, and this one did ask a good deal. </s>
<s>  bertie and billy wrote the full time allotted, and found that they could have filled an hour more without coming to the end of their thoughts. </s>
<s>  comparing notes at lunch, their information was discovered to have been lacking here and there. </s>
<s>  nevertheless, it was no failure. </s>
<s>  their inner convictions were sure of fifty per cent at least, and this was all they asked of the gods. </s>
<s>  "i was ripping about the ego," said bertie. </s>
<s>  "i was rather splendid myself," said billy, "when i got going. </s>
<s>  and i gave him a huge steer about memory. </s>
<s> " after lunch both retired to their beds and fell into sweet oblivion until seven o'clock, when they rose and dined, and after playing a little poker went to bed again pretty early. </s>
<s>  some six mornings later, when the professor returned their papers to them, their minds were washed almost as clear of plato and thales as were their bodies of yesterday's dust. </s>
<s>  the dates and doctrines, hastily memorized to rattle off upon the great occasion, lay only upon the surface of their minds, and after use they quickly evaporated. </s>
<s>  to their pleasure and most genuine astonishment, the professor paid them high compliments. </s>
<s>  bertie's discussion of the double personality had been the most intelligent which had come in from any of the class. </s>
<s>  the illustration of the intoxicated hack-driver who had fallen from his hack and inquired who it was that had fallen, and then had pitied himself, was, said the professor, as original and perfect an illustration of our subjective-objectivity as he had met with in all his researches. </s>
<s>  and billy's suggestions concerning the inherency of time and space in the mind the professor had also found very striking and independent, particularly his reasoning based upon the well-known distortions of time and space which hashish and other drugs produce in us. </s>
<s>  this was the sort of thing which the professor had wanted from his students: free comment and discussions, the spirit of the course, rather than any strict adherence to the letter. </s>
<s>  he had constructed his questions to elicit as much individual discussion as possible and had been somewhat disappointed in his hopes. </s>
<s>  yes, bertie and billy were astonished. </s>
<s>  but their astonishment did not equal that of oscar, who had answered many of the questions in the professor's own language. </s>
<s>  oscar received seventy-five per cent for this achievement--a good mark. </s>
<s>  but billy's mark was eighty-six and bertie's ninety. </s>
<s>  "there is some mistake," said oscar to them when they told him . </s>
<s>  and he hastened to the professor with his tale. </s>
<s>  "there is no mistake," said the professor. </s>
<s>  oscar smiled with increased deference. </s>
<s>  "" he urged, "i assure you, sir, those young men knew absolutely nothing. </s>
<s>  i was their tutor, and they knew nothing at all. </s>
<s>  i taught them all their information myself. </s>
<s> " "in that case," replied the professor, not pleased with oscar's tale-bearing, "you must have given them more than you could spare. </s>
<s>  good morning. </s>
<s> " oscar never understood. </s>
<s>  but he graduated considerably higher than bertie and billy, who were not able to discover many other courses so favorable to "orriginal rresearch" as was philosophy 4. </s>
<s>  that is twenty years ago, to-day bertie is treasurer of the new amsterdam trust company, in wall street. </s>
<s>  billy is superintendent of passenger traffic of the new york and chicago air line. </s>
<s>  oscar is successful too. </s>
<s>  he has acquired a lot of information. </s>
<s>  his smile is unchanged. </s>
<s>  he has published a careful work entitled "the minor poets of cinquecento," and he writes book reviews for the evening post. </s>

<s>  209 the bobbsey twins at school chapter i a circus train "mamma, how much longer have we got to ride?" asked nan bobbsey, turning in her seat in the railroad car, to look at her parents, who sat behind her. </s>
<s>  "are you getting tired?" asked nan's brother bert. </s>
<s>  "if you are i'll sit next to the window, and watch the telegraph poles and trees go by. </s>
<s>   maybe that's what tires you, nan," he added, and his father smiled, for he saw that bert had two thoughts for himself, and one for his sister. </s>
<s>  "no, i am not tired of the scenery," answered the brownhaired and browneyed girl, "but you may sit next the window, bert, if you like. </s>
<s> " "thanks!" he exclaimed as he scrambled over to the place his sister gave up. </s>
<s>  "are you tired, dearie?" asked mrs. </s>
<s>  bobbsey, leaning forward and smoothing out her daughter's hair with her hand. </s>
<s>  "if you would like to sit with me and put your head in my lap, papa can go to another seat and  -" "oh, no, mamma, i am not as tired as that," and nan laughed. </s>
<s>  "i was just wondering how soon we'd be home. </s>
<s> " "i would rather be back at the seashore," said bert, not turning his gaze from the window, for the train was passing along some fields just then, and in one a boy was driving home some cows to be milked, as evening was coming on. </s>
<s>  bert was wondering if one of the cows might not chase the boy. </s>
<s>  bert didn't really want to see the boy hurt by a cow, of course, but he thought that if the cow was going to take after the boy, anyhow, he might just as well see it. </s>
<s>  but the cows were very well-behaved, and went along slowly. </s>
<s>  "yes, the seashore was nice," murmured nan, as she leaned her head back on the cushioned seat, "but i am glad to be going home again. </s>
<s>  i want to see some of the girls, and -" "yes, and i'll be looking for some of the boys, too," put in bert. </s>
<s>  "but school will soon begin, and that's no fun!" mr. </s>
<s>  and mrs. </s>
<s>  bobbsey smiled at each other, and mr. </s>
<s>  bobbsey, taking out a timetable, looked to see how much longer they would be on the train. </s>
<s>  "it's about an hour yet," he said to nan, and she sighed. </s>
<s>  really she was more tired than she cared to let her mother know. </s>
<s>  just ahead of the two bobbsey children were another set of them. </s>
<s>  i say "set" for the bobbsey children came "in sets. </s>
<s> " there were two pairs of twins, bert and nan, nearly nine years of age, and flossie and freddie, almost five. </s>
<s>   whereas the two older children were rather tall and slim, with dark brown hair and eyes, the littler twins were short and fat, and had light hair and blue eyes. </s>
<s>  the two pairs of twins were quite a contrast, and many persons stopped to look at them as they passed along the street together. </s>
<s>  "no, sir," went on bert musingly, "school's no fun, and it starts about a week after we get home. </s>
<s>  no chance to have a good time!" "we've had fun all summer," replied his sister. </s>
<s>  "i rather like school. </s>
<s> " "mamma, are we going to school this year?" asked flossie, as she looked back with a quick turning of her head that set her yellow curls to dancing. </s>
<s>  "if we are, i am going to sit with flossie - can't i?" asked freddie, kneeling in the seat so that he could face back to his father and mother. </s>
<s>  indeed his request was not strange, since the two younger twins were always together even more so than their brother and sister. </s>
<s>  "yes, i think you and freddie will start school regularly this term," said mrs. </s>
<s>  bobbsey, " if it can be arranged, you may sit together. </s>
<s>   we'll see about that. </s>
<s>  be careful, freddie, don't put your head out of the window," she cautioned quickly, for the little chap had turned in his seat again, and was leaning forward to see a horse galloping about a field, kicking up its heels at the sound of the puffing engine. </s>
<s>  "it's my turn to sit by the window, anyhow," said flossie. </s>
<s>  "it is not! we haven't passed a station yet," disputed freddie. </s>
<s>  "oh, we have so!" cried his little sister. </s>
<s>  "freddie bobbsey!" and she pointed her finger at him. </s>
<s>  "children - children," said mrs. </s>
<s>  bobbsey, reprovingly. </s>
<s>  "are you two taking turns?" asked bert, smiling with an older brother's superior wisdom. </s>
<s>  "yes," answered flossie, "he was to have the seat next to the window until we came to a station, and then it's to be my turn until we pass another station, and we have passed one, but he won't change over. </s>
<s> " "well, it was only a little station, anyhow," asserted freddie, "and it came awful quick after the last one. </s>
<s>  it isn't fair!" "there's a seat up ahead for you, bert," suggested mr. </s>
<s>  bobbsey, as a gentleman got up, when the train approached a station. </s>
<s> " you can sit there, and let flossie or freddie take your place. </s>
<s> " "all right," answered bert goodnaturedly, as he got up. </s>
<s>  the train rolled on, the two younger twins each having a window now, and nan occupying the seat with her little brother. </s>
<s>  for a time there was quietness, until mrs. </s>
<s>  bobbsey said to her husband: "hadn't you better get some of the satchels together, richard, and tell dinah what she is to carry?" "i think i will," he answered, as he went up the car aisle a little way to where a very fat colored woman sat. </s>
<s>  she was dinah, the bobbsey cook, and they took her with them always when going away for the summer. </s>
<s>  now they were on their way to their city house, and of course dinah came back, too. </s>
<s>  "mamma, i am thirsty," said flossie, after a bit. </s>
<s>  "please may i get a drink?" "i want one, too," said freddie quicky. </s>
<s>  "come on, flossie, we'll both go down to the end of the car where the water cooler is. </s>
<s> " "there's no cup," nan said. </s>
<s>  "i went a little while ago, but a lady let me take her glass. </s>
<s> " "and if there was a cup, i would rather they didn't use it," said mrs. </s>
<s>  bobbsey. </s>
<s>  "one never knows who has last handled a public cup. </s>
<s> " "but i want a drink," insisted flossie, a bit fretfully, for she was tired from the long journey. </s>
<s>  "i know it, dear," said her mamma gently, "and i am getting out the silver cup for you. </s>
<s>  only you must be very careful of it, and not drop it, for it is solid silver and will dent, or mar, easily. </s>
<s> " she was searching in her bag, and presently took out a very valuable drinking cup, gold lined and with much engraving on it. </s>
<s>  the cup had been presented to flossie and freddie on their first birthday, and bore each of their names. </s>
<s>  they were very proud of it. </s>
<s>  "now be careful," warned mrs. </s>
<s>  bobbsey, as she held out the cup. </s>
<s>  "hold on to the seats as you walk along. </s>
<s> " "i'll carry the cup," said freddie. </s>
<s>  "i am the biggest. </s>
<s> " "you are not!" declared his sister quickly. </s>
<s>  "i am just as big. </s>
<s> " "well, anyhow, i am a boy," went on freddie, and flossie could not deny this. </s>
<s>  "and boys always carries things," her brother went on. </s>
<s>  "i'll carry the cup. </s>
<s> " "very well, but be careful of it," said his mother with a smile, as she handed it to him. </s>
<s>  the two children went down the aisle of the car. </s>
<s>   they stopped for a moment at the seat where dinah was. </s>
<s>  "is snoop all right?" asked freddie, peering into a box that was made of slats, with spaces between them for air. </s>
<s>  "'deed an' he am, honey," said dinah with a smile, laughing so that she shook all over her big, fleshy body. </s>
<s>  "i 'specs he is lonesome. </s>
<s>  aren't you, snoop?" asked flossie, poking her finger in one of the cracks, to caress, as well as she could, a fat, black cat. </s>
<s>  the cat, like dinah the cook, went with the bobbseys on all their summer outings. </s>
<s>  "well, maybe he am lonesome," admitted dinah, with another laugh, "but he is been real good. </s>
<s>  he hadn't yowled once - not once!" "he'll soon be out of his cage. </s>
<s>  won't you, snoop?" said freddie, and then he and his sister went on to the water cooler. </s>
<s>  near it they saw something else to look at. </s>
<s>  this was the sight of a very, very fat lady who occupied nearly all of one seat in the end of the car. </s>
<s>  she was so large that only a very little baby could have found room beside her. </s>
<s>  "look - look at her," whispered flossie to freddie, as they paused. </s>
<s>  the fat woman's back was toward them, and she seemed to be much interested in looking out of the window. </s>
<s>  "she is fat," admitted freddie. </s>
<s>  "did you ever see one so big before?" "only in a circus," said flossie. </s>
<s>  "she would make make two of dinah," went on her brother. </s>
<s>  "she would not," contradicted flossie quickly. </s>
<s>  "'cause dinah's black, and this lady is white. </s>
<s> " "that's so," admitted freddie, with smile. </s>
<s>  "i didn't think of that. </s>
<s> " a sway of the train nearly made flossic fall, and she caught quickly at her brother. </s>
<s>  "look out!" he cried. </s>
<s>  "you 'mos knocked the cup down. </s>
<s> " "i didn't mean to," spoke flossie. </s>
<s>  "oh, there goes my hat! get it, freddie, before someone steps on it!" her brother managed to get the hat just as it was sliding under the seat where the fat lady sat. </s>
<s>  after some confusion the hat was placed on flossie's head, and once more she and her brother moved on toward the water cooler. </s>
<s>  it was getting dusk now, and some of the lamps in the car had been lighted. </s>
<s>  freddie, carrying the cup, filled it with water at the little faucet,  very politely, offered it to his sister first. </s>
<s>  freddie was no better than most boys of his age, but he did not forget some of the little polite ways his mamma was continually teaching him. </s>
<s>  one of these was "ladies first," though freddie did not always carry it out, especially when he was in a hurry. </s>
<s>  "do you want any more?" he asked, before he would get himself a drink. </s>
<s>  "just a little," said flossie. </s>
<s>  "the silver cup doesn't hold much. </s>
<s> " "no, i guess it's 'cause there's so much silver in it," replied her brother. </s>
<s>  "it's worth a lot of money, mamma said. </s>
<s> " "yes, and it's all ours. </s>
<s>  when i grow up i am going to have my half made into a bracelet. </s>
<s> " "you are?" said freddie slowly. </s>
<s>  "if you do there won't be enough left for me to drink out of. </s>
<s> " "well, you can have your share of it made into a watch, and drink out of a glass. </s>
<s> " "that's so," agreed freddie, his face brightening. </s>
<s>  he gave his sister more water, and then took some himself. </s>
<s>  as he drank his eyes were constantly looking at the very fat lady who filled so much of her seat. </s>
<s>   she turned from the window and looked at the two children, smiling broadly. </s>
<s>  freddie was somewhat confused, and looked down quickly. </s>
<s>  just then the train gave another lurch and freddie suddenly spilled some of the water on his coat. </s>
<s>  "oh, look what you did!" cried flossie. </s>
<s>  "and that's your best coat!" "i - i couldn't help it," stammered freddie. </s>
<s>  "never mind, little boy," said the fat lady. </s>
<s>  "it's only clean water. </s>
<s>   come here and i'll wipe it off with my handkerchief. </s>
<s>  i would come to you, only i am so stout it's hard enough for me to walk anyhow, and when the train is moving i simply can't do it. </s>
<s> " freddie and flossie went to her seat, and with a handkerchief, that flossie said afterward was almost as big as a table cloth, the fat lady wiped the water off freddie's coat. </s>
<s>  the little boy held the silver cup in his h and feeling, somehow, that he ought to repay the fat lady's kindness in some way, after thanking her, he asked: "would you like a drink of water? i can bring it to you if you would. </s>
<s> " "thank you," she answered. </s>
<s>  "what a kind little boy you are! i saw you give your sister a drink first, too. </s>
<s>  yes, i would like a drink. </s>
<s>  i have been wanting one some time, but i didn't dare get up to go after it. </s>
<s> " "i'll get it!" cried freddie, eager to show what a little man he was. </s>
<s>   he made his way to the cooler without accident, and then, moving slowly, taking hold of the seat on the way back, so as not to spill the water, he brought the silver cup brimful to the fat lady. </s>
<s>  "oh, what a beautiful cup," she said, as she took it. </s>
<s>  "and it cost a lot of money, too," said flossie. </s>
<s>  "it's ours - our birthday cup, and when i grow up i am going to have a bracelet made from my half. </s>
<s> " "that will be nice," said the fat lady, as she prepared to drink. </s>
<s>  but she never got more than a sip of the water freddie had so kindly brought her, for, no sooner did her lips touch the cup than there was a grinding, shrieking sound, a jar to the railway coach, and the train came to such a sudden stop that many passengers were thrown from their seats. </s>
<s>  flossie and freddie sat down suddenly in the aisle, but they were so fat that they did not mind it in the least. </s>

<s>  in short, before he had time to think what a wonderful affair it was, he beheld an abundant harvest of what looked like human beings, armed with helmets and breastplates, shields, swords, and spears. </s>
<s>  and before they were well out of the earth, they brandished their weapons, and clashed them one against another, seeming to think, little while as they had yet lived, that they had wasted too much of life without a battle. </s>
<s>  every tooth of the dragon had produced one of these sons of deadly mischief. </s>

<s>  so enraged did they all look, that cadmus fully expected them to put the whole world to the sword. </s>

<s> " graham had a surging vision of a great hall crowded with people. </s>

<s>  where is young rupert of hentzau--the boy who came so nigh to beating me? when his name comes into my head, i feel my hand grip and the blood move quicker through my veins: and the hint of fate--the presentiment-- seems to grow stronger and more definite, and to whisper insistently in my ear that i have yet a hand to play with young rupert. </s>
<s>  therefore i exercise myself in arms, and seek to put off the day when the vigour of youth must leave me. </s>
<s>  one break comes every year in my quiet life. </s>
<s>  then i go to dresden, and there i am met by my dear friend and companion, fritz von tarlenheim. </s>
<s>  last time, his pretty wife helga came, and a lusty crowing baby with her. </s>
<s>  and for a week fritz and i are together, and i hear all of what falls out in strelsau. </s>
<s>  and in the evenings, as we walk and smoke together, we talk of sapt, and of the king, and often of young rupert. </s>
<s>   as the hours grow small, at last we speak of flavia. </s>
<s>  for every year fritz carries with him to dresden a little box. </s>

<s> " and the like i send back by him. </s>
<s>  that message, and the wearing of the rings, are all that now bind me and the queen of ruritania. </s>
<s>  far--nobler, as i hold her, for the act--she has followed where her duty to her country and her house led her, and is the wife of the king, uniting his subjects to him by the love they bear to her, giving peace and quiet days to thousands by her self-sacrifice. </s>
<s>  there are moments when i dare not think of it, but there are others when i rise in spirit to where she ever dwells. </s>
<s>  then i can thank god that i love the noblest lady in the world, the most gracious and beautiful, and that there was nothing in my love that made her fall short in her high duty. </s>
<s>  shall i see her face again--the pale face and the glorious hair? of that i know nothing. </s>
<s>  fate has no hint, my heart no presentiment. </s>
<s>  i do not know. </s>
<s>  in this world, perhaps--nay, it is likely--never. </s>
<s>  and can it be that somewhere, in a manner whereof our flesh-bound minds have no apprehension, she and i will be together again, with nothing to come between us, nothing to forbid our love? that i know not, nor wiser heads than mine. </s>
<s>  but if it be never-- if i can never hold sweet converse again with her, or look upon her face, or know from her her love. </s>
<s>  why, then, this side the grave, i will live as becomes the man whom she loves. </s>
<s>   for the other side, i must pray a dreamless sleep. </s>
